conbody.p: Analyzer Menus and Navigation provide you with convenient and quick access to reports and data modeling features as well as ability to perform data administration tasks, including report scheduling and user and group account administration. The menu pane to the left of your dashboard screen presents four main task areas: Dashboard, Data Design, Scheduler, and Administration, as shown below in Figure 1-14.

p.note: Click the icon in the upper-left corner to hide or display the left menu pane.

conbody.p: Click the arrow to access submenu items, which are described below for each main task area. The Dashboard tab does not have any submenus.
